text: All of Me is a 1984 American romantic fantasy comedy movie directed by Carl Reiner and based on the unpublished novel Me Too by Edwin Davis. It stars Steve Martin, Madolyn Smith, Victoria Tennant, Lily Tomlin, Richard Libertini, Dana Elcar and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1984 romantic comedy movies Category:1984 fantasy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Carl Reiner Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: All of Me (1984 movie)
